entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cowansville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening. Freezing rain over southern sections. Snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
